snippet: An appeals court judge effectively barred O. Aldon James Jr., former president of the National Arts Club, from the club, at least until the court rules in a related matter.
abstract: Appellate court stays the March ruling of State Supreme Court Justice Carol R Edmead and effectively bars O Aldon James Jr, former president of the National Arts Club, from the facility until further legal review.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court judge effectively barred O. Aldon James Jr., former president of the National Arts Club, from the club, at least until the court rules in a related matter.

headline.seo: National Arts Club Wins Legal Round Against Aldon James
headline.main: Setback for Ex-Leader of Arts Club
headline.print_headline: Setback for Ex-Leader of Arts Club
